title: Providers
text: Partnerships with established healthcare providers, such as hospitals and clinics, will ensure effective and efficient delivery of healthcare services to our beneficiaries, maximising the programme's impact and ensuring access to quality care.

title: Insurers
text: Our partnership with reputable insurance companies will provide comprehensive support to the programme. Beyond offering affordable insurance coverage to our communities, it will also protect donated medical devices, provide life insurance coverage for our OOI team members, as well as structure coverage to protect the fund.

title: Trustees
text: Collaboration with experienced trustees/ investment advisors will ensure responsible management of funds dedicated to this programme, maximising impact and ensuring long-term sustainability.

title: CBOs
text: We will work closely with Community Based Organisations (CBOs) to understand the unique health needs of specific communities, tailor interventions, and ensure effective implementation at the grassroots level.

title: HMOs
text: Partnering with Health Maintenance Organisations (HMOs) will provide beneficiaries with access to a network of healthcare providers, ensuring quality and timely care.
